member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_ENDING_ACCESS_RESOLVE_SUBRESOURCE_PARAMETERS
member.summary: Describes the subresources involved in resolving at the conclusion of a render pass.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_ENDING_ACCESS_RESOLVE_SUBRESOURCE_PARAMETERS.DstX
member.summary: A UINT. The x coordinate within the destination subresource.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_ENDING_ACCESS_RESOLVE_SUBRESOURCE_PARAMETERS.DstY
member.summary: A UINT. The y coordinate within the destination subresource.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_ENDING_ACCESS_RESOLVE_SUBRESOURCE_PARAMETERS.SrcRect
member.summary: A D3D12_RECT. The rectangle within the source subresource.
